typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		transaction_id as string,
		cust_id as string,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as string,
		prod_cat_code as string,
		Qty as string,
		Rate as string,
		Tax as string,
		total_amt as string,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSstagingTransactions
source(output(
		Store_Key as integer,
		Store_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimStoreType
ADLSstagingTransactions aggregate(groupBy(Store_type),
	count = count(transaction_id)) ~> AggregateStores
AggregateStores, DimStoreType exists(AggregateStores@Store_type == DimStoreType@Store_Type,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Store_Key as integer,
		Store_Type as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Store_Type = Store_type
	)) ~> SinkDimStoreType

source(output(
		customer_Id as string,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSstagingCustomer
source(output(
		customer_key as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		customer_name as string,
		DOB as string,
		city_code as string,
		gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
ADLSstagingCustomer, DimCustomer exists(toInteger(ADLSstagingCustomer@customer_Id) == DimCustomer@customer_Id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists
Exists derive(customerId = toInteger(customer_Id)) ~> DerivedColumn1
ADLSstagingCustomer, DimCustomer exists(toInteger(ADLSstagingCustomer@customer_Id) == DimCustomer@customer_Id,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 derive(CustomerId = toInteger(customer_Id)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_key as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		customer_name as string,
		DOB as string,
		city_code as string,
		gender as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		customer_Id = customerId,
		customer_name = Customer_Name,
		DOB,
		city_code,
		gender = Gender
	)) ~> SinkDimCustomer
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_key as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		customer_name as string,
		DOB as string,
		city_code as string,
		gender as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['customer_Id'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		customer_Id = CustomerId,
		customer_name = Customer_Name,
		DOB,
		city_code,
		gender = Gender
	)) ~> SinkUpdateDimCustomer

source(output(
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		prod_cat as string,
		prod_sub_cat_code as integer,
		prod_subcat as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSstagingProCatSubCat
source(output(
		Prod_Cat_SubCat_Key as integer,
		Product_Cat_Code as integer,
		Product_Category as string,
		Product_SubCat_Code as integer,
		Product_SubCategory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProdCatSubCat
ADLSstagingProCatSubCat, DimProdCatSubCat exists(prod_cat_code == Product_Cat_Code
	&& prod_sub_cat_code == Product_SubCat_Code,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1 derive(ProductCatCode = toInteger(prod_cat_code),
		ProdSubCatCode = toInteger(prod_sub_cat_code)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Prod_Cat_SubCat_Key as integer,
		Product_Cat_Code as integer,
		Product_Category as string,
		Product_SubCat_Code as integer,
		Product_SubCategory as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Product_Cat_Code = ProductCatCode,
		Product_Category = prod_cat,
		Product_SubCat_Code = ProdSubCatCode,
		Product_SubCategory = prod_subcat
	)) ~> SinkDimProdCatSubCatInsert

source(output(
		transaction_id as integer,
		cust_id as integer,
		tran_date as string,
		prod_subcat_code as integer,
		prod_cat_code as integer,
		Qty as integer,
		Rate as float,
		Tax as float,
		total_amt as float,
		Store_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ADLSStagingTransactions
source(output(
		customer_key as integer,
		customer_Id as integer,
		customer_name as string,
		DOB as string,
		city_code as string,
		gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
source(output(
		Prod_Cat_SubCat_Key as integer,
		Product_Cat_Code as integer,
		Product_Category as string,
		Product_SubCat_Code as integer,
		Product_SubCategory as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProdCatSubCat
source(output(
		Store_Key as integer,
		Store_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimStoreType
source(output(
		DateKey as integer,
		Date as date,
		FullDateUK as string,
		FullDateUSA as string,
		DayOfMonth as string,
		DaySuffix as string,
		DayName as string,
		DayOfWeekUSA as string,
		DayOfWeekUK as string,
		DayOfWeekInMonth as string,
		DayOfWeekInYear as string,
		DayOfQuarter as string,
		DayOfYear as string,
		WeekOfMonth as string,
		WeekOfQuarter as string,
		WeekOfYear as string,
		Month as string,
		MonthName as string,
		MonthOfQuarter as string,
		Quarter as string,
		QuarterName as string,
		Year as string,
		YearName as string,
		MonthYear as string,
		MMYYYY as string,
		FirstDayOfMonth as date,
		LastDayOfMonth as date,
		FirstDayOfQuarter as date,
		LastDayOfQuarter as date,
		FirstDayOfYear as date,
		LastDayOfYear as date,
		IsHolidayUSA as boolean,
		IsWeekday as boolean,
		HolidayUSA as string,
		IsHolidayUK as boolean,
		HolidayUK as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimDate
ADLSStagingTransactions, DimCustomer join(cust_id == customer_Id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinTransactionCustomer
JoinTransactionCustomer, DimProdCatSubCat join(prod_cat_code == Product_Cat_Code
	&& prod_subcat_code == Product_SubCat_Code,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinProductCatSubCat
JoinProductCatSubCat, DimDate join(toDate(tran_date,'dd-MM-yyyy') == Date,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimDate
JoinDimDate, DimStoreType join(ADLSStagingTransactions@Store_type == DimStoreType@Store_Type,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinDimStore
JoinDimStore sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Fact_Tran_Key as integer,
		customer_key as integer,
		Prod_Cat_SubCat_Key as integer,
		Store_Key as integer,
		tran_date as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		rate as double,
		tax as double,
		total_amount as double
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		customer_key,
		Prod_Cat_SubCat_Key,
		Store_Key,
		tran_date = DateKey,
		Quantity = Qty,
		rate = Rate,
		tax = Tax,
		total_amount = total_amt
	)) ~> SinkFactTable

parameters{
	SourceTable as string,
	WaterMarkField as string
}
source(output(
		customer_Id as string,
		DOB as string,
		Gender as string,
		city_code as string,
		Customer_Name as string,
		Created_Modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($SourceTable)]) ~> source1
ConditionalSplit1@Customer aggregate(Max_Created_Modified_Date = max(toTimestamp(toString(byName($WaterMarkField)),'dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm'))) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 derive(TableName = $SourceTable) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Max_Created_Modified_Date)==false())) ~> AlterRow1
source1 split(equals($SourceTable,'Customer.csv'),
	equals($SourceTable,'Transactions.csv'),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(Customer, Transactions)
ConditionalSplit1@Transactions aggregate(Max_Tran_Date = max(toTimestamp(byName(lower($WaterMarkField)),'dd-MM-yyyy'))) ~> Aggregate2
Aggregate2 derive(TableName = $SourceTable) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(isNull(Max_Tran_Date)==false())) ~> AlterRow2
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Source as string,
		Source_Table as string,
		Dest_Table as string,
		Columns as string,
		Watermark_Column as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp,
		Enabled as boolean,
		Load_Flag as string,
		Status as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Dest_Table'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Dest_Table = TableName,
		Watermark_Value = Max_Created_Modified_Date
	)) ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Source as string,
		Source_Table as string,
		Dest_Table as string,
		Columns as string,
		Watermark_Column as string,
		Watermark_Value as timestamp,
		Enabled as boolean,
		Load_Flag as string,
		Status as string,
		Comment as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Dest_Table'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Dest_Table = TableName,
		Watermark_Value = Max_Tran_Date
	)) ~> sink2

activities.name: If Condition Based on Type of Load

ifTrueActivities.name: get max of Last MaxUpdateDate Config

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Watermark_Value from dbo.config where Source_Table like '@{item().Source_Table}'

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy Delta load from Tables to ADLS

dependsOn.activity: get max of Last MaxUpdateDate Config

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from @{item().Source_Table}
where 
convert(datetime,@{item().Watermark_Column},105) >
convert(datetime,substring(
replace('@{activity('get max of Last MaxUpdateDate Config').output.firstRow.Watermark_Value}',
'T',' '),0,20),120)

ifTrueActivities.name: Update Config Watermark
ifTrueActivities.description: Update config Tables' Watermark Values based on the last modified date of records in tables staged to ADLS.

dependsOn.activity: Copy Delta load from Tables to ADLS
If Condition Based on Type of Load

sqlReaderQuery.value:
update dbo.config 
set Status = 'Success' where Dest_Table = '@{item().Dest_Table}'

select 1

ifTrueActivities.name: get max of Last MaxUpdateDate Config_copy1

sqlReaderQuery.value: select Watermark_Value from dbo.config where Source_Table like '@{item().Source_Table}'

dependsOn.activity: get max of Last MaxUpdateDate Config_copy1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
update dbo.config 
set Status = 'Success' where Dest_Table = '@{item().Dest_Table}'

select 1

properties.description: Pipeline to load data from OnPrem and FileSystem to Azure Data Lake Storage as staging tables. Then the data is loaded to Fact and dimension tables in Datawarehouse.

activities.name: Onprem To ADLS Staging Delta Copy

dependsOn.activity: Onprem To ADLS Staging Delta Copy
